article.headline: Mercer 77, Savannah State 60
article.story: SAVANNAH, Ga. (AP) -- Three players scored 69 of Mercer's 77 points in a victory over Savannah State Monday night. Will Emerson had 22 points and 11 rebounds, Andrew Brown scored 20, and Sam Dolan 17 for the Bears (7-16). Savannah State (2-25) hit only 31 percent from the field -- and just 4-of-22 from 3-point range. Javon Randolph led the Tigers with 18 points. Mercer went on a 10-0 run early in the first half and led 17-5 after a layup by Brown less than five minutes into the game. The Bears stretched the lead to 12 again at the 11:46 mark, but Savannah State chipped away and trailed 35-30 after a Randolph 3-pointer with just 11 seconds left in the first half. Another 3-pointer by Randolph cut the lead to one point, 39-38, four minutes into the second half, but Mercer got it back up to 54-44 on a Brown 3-pointer with 10:02 left.
